channel.title: CVE Feed for Haas -- Haas CNC Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Haas -- Haas CNC Controller

item.title: CVE-2022-41636|2024-09-16T19:19:17.893Z -- haas -- haas%20cnc%20controller
item.description: Communication traffic involving "Ethernet Q Commands" service of Haas Controller version 100.20.000.1110 is transmitted in cleartext. This allows an attacker to obtain sensitive information being passed to and from the controller.
